login.title: Admin Login
login.subtitle: Enter your API token to access the admin panel
login.rememberHint: Your token will be stored securely in your browser
login.privacyNote: By checking 'Remember token', you consent to storing authentication data locally.

help.title: Need a token?
help.text: Use the generateToken command via API, or check your auth.php config file for the default token.

logout.title: Logout
logout.message: You have been logged out successfully

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your site through a friendly interface

projects.title: Project Manager
projects.restore_warning: A pre-restore backup will be created automatically.
projects.restoreWarningWithBackup: A backup of your current project will be created before restoring.
projects.restoreWarningNoBackup: Your current project state will be lost! Make sure you have a backup if needed.
projects.createBackupBeforeRestore: Create a backup of the current project before restoring
projects.backup_hint: Click "Backup" to create your first backup
projects.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The project and all its data will be permanently deleted.
projects.nameHelp: Lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores only
projects.activateAfterCreate: Switch to this project after creation

urlChange.title: URL Structure Change
urlChange.message: This command will change your site's URL structure. The admin panel URL will change, and you will be automatically redirected to the new location after execution.

serverConfig.title: Server Configuration Required
serverConfig.message: This command renames the physical public folder. After execution, your site will be inaccessible until you update your server configuration (Apache VirtualHost, nginx config, etc.) to point to the new folder name.
serverConfig.useCase: Use case: switching between test/production environments sharing the same server root with different DNS configurations.

batchMode.title: Batch Mode
batchMode.message: Configure the command parameters and click "Save to Queue" to add this command to your batch queue. The command will not be executed until you run the entire batch.

errors.fileUploadBatch: File uploads cannot be added to batch queue

history.title: Command History
history.subtitle: View executed commands and their results
history.noHistory: No commands have been executed yet
history.noHistoryFiltered: No command history found for the selected filters.
history.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear command history?

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

interactions.title: Interactions
interactions.subtitle: Manage interaction schemas and project interactions

schemas.title: Interaction Schemas
schemas.noCustomSchemasHint: Create custom schemas to extend the interaction system

form.handlerHint: JavaScript code to execute. 'params' object contains the parameter values.

instances.title: Project Interactions
instances.noInteractionsHint: Create interactions to add behavior to your site

form.triggerHint: CSS selector and event (e.g., #myBtn click, .card hover)

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
deleteConfirm.schemaMessage: Are you sure you want to delete schema '{id}'? This cannot be undone.
deleteConfirm.interactionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete interaction '{id}'? This cannot be undone.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.subtitle: Quick access to your bookmarked commands
favorites.searchPlaceholder: Search commands to add to favorites...

empty.title: No favorites yet
empty.message: Search for commands below to add them to your favorites.

modal.clearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all favorites?

structure.title: Structure Viewer
structure.subtitle: Visual tree view of page and component structures

tree.title: Structure Tree
tree.empty: Select a structure type and name above to view

batch.title: Batch Execution
batch.subtitle: Execute multiple commands in sequence
batch.emptyQueueHint: Add commands from the list on the right

importJson.title: Import JSON Commands
importJson.hint: Paste a JSON array of commands to add them to the queue. Perfect for AI-generated command sequences.
importJson.label: JSON Commands Array

templates.title: Command Templates
templates.hint: Pre-built command sequences for common tasks. Click to preview, then load into queue.

freshStart.title: Fresh Start
freshStart.desc: Wipe all content to blank slate: delete routes, clear assets, empty translations, reset CSS. Keeps languages & 404 page.

starterBusiness.title: Starter Business
starterBusiness.desc: Business website with menu, footer, 4 pages (home, about, services, contact) and teal theme. Single language.

starterBusinessMultilingual.title: Starter Business (Multilingual)
starterBusinessMultilingual.desc: Same as Starter Business with EN + FR translations and language switcher in footer.

landingPage.title: Landing Page
landingPage.desc: Create a single-page landing structure with hero, features, and CTA sections.

landingPageMultilingual.title: Landing Page (Multilingual)
landingPageMultilingual.desc: Same as Landing Page with EN + FR translations and language switcher.

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.subtitle: Complete reference for all available API commands

intro.description: Use AI assistants (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini...) to create complete websites via QuickSite commands.

chooseSpec.title: Choose a Spec
chooseSpec.hint: Select "Landing Page" for single-page sites or "Website" for multi-page.

describeGoal.title: Describe Your Goal
describeGoal.hint: Use an example or write your own description with details.

copyPrompt.title: Copy Full Prompt
copyPrompt.hint: The spec + your goal are combined and ready to paste.

importExecute.title: Import & Execute
importExecute.hint: Paste AI's JSON response and click Execute Now.

promptBuilder.title: What do you want to build?
promptBuilder.placeholder: Describe what you want to create...
promptBuilder.beSpecific: Be specific! The more details you provide, the better the AI output.

importResponse.title: Import AI Response
importResponse.hint: After sending the prompt to AI, paste its JSON response below

browser.title: AI Specifications
browser.subtitle: Generate AI-ready prompts for common QuickSite tasks
browser.step3: Copy the generated prompt to your AI assistant
browser.step4: Execute the AI response in the Batch panel
browser.invalidImport: Invalid import file: must contain spec and template

info.title: Creating a Custom Spec
info.text: Custom specs are saved to the secure/admin/ai_specs/custom/ folder. They will appear alongside core specs in the browser. Make sure to add translation keys to your locale files for labels and descriptions.

notFound.title: Spec Not Found
notFound.message: The requested AI specification could not be found for editing.

editor.validJson: Valid JSON - All required fields present
editor.fixErrors: Please fix JSON errors before previewing
editor.previewEmpty: Click "Preview" to see the rendered prompt

creation.title: Creation
creation.desc: Create new websites and pages from scratch

content.title: Content
content.desc: Add or update page content and text

notFound.title: Spec Not Found
notFound.message: The requested AI specification could not be found.

spec.yourPromptPlaceholder: Describe what you want to create... Click an example to fill this automatically.
spec.promptPlaceholder: Fill in the parameters and click Generate to create a prompt...

addLanguage.title: Add Language
addLanguage.description: Add a new language to your multilingual website with translations and language switcher updates.

createLanding.title: Create Landing Page
createLanding.description: Generate a complete single-page landing website from scratch with hero, features, testimonials, and contact sections.

coffeeShop.title: Coffee Shop
coffeeShop.prompt: Create a landing page for a coffee shop with hero, menu highlights, and contact form

saas.title: SaaS Product
saas.prompt: Create a modern landing for a project management SaaS with features, pricing, testimonials

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.prompt: Create a minimalist portfolio landing for a photographer with gallery and contact

createWebsite.title: Create Multi-Page Website
createWebsite.description: Generate a complete multi-page website with navigation, multiple pages, shared header/footer, and consistent styling.

pages.label: Pages to create
pages.help: Comma-separated page names (home is always included)

business.title: Business
business.prompt: Create a professional website for a consulting firm with home, about, services, team, contact

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.prompt: Create a restaurant website with home, menu, about, gallery, reservations, contact

agency.title: Creative Agency
agency.prompt: Create a creative agency website with home, work, services, team, blog, contact

addPage.title: Add New Page
addPage.description: Add a new page to an existing website with proper navigation links and translations for all languages.

navPlacement.label: Navigation placement
navPlacement.help: Where to add the link to the new page

blog.title: Blog Page
blog.prompt: Add a blog page with recent articles list and category sidebar

faq.title: FAQ Page
faq.prompt: Add a FAQ page with collapsible questions organized by topic

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.prompt: Add a privacy policy page (footer link only) with GDPR-compliant sections

addSection.title: Add Section to Page
addSection.description: Add a new section to an existing page at a specific position (before/after another section).

targetPage.label: Target page
targetPage.help: Select the page to add the section to

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.prompt: Add a testimonials section after features with 3 customer quotes

cta.title: CTA Banner
cta.prompt: Add a call-to-action banner before footer with newsletter signup

stats.title: Statistics
stats.prompt: Add a statistics section with animated counters showing achievements

translateLanguage.title: Translate Content
translateLanguage.description: Translate all website content from the default language to a target language using natural, accurate translations.

targetLanguage.label: Target language
targetLanguage.help: Select the language to translate into

french.title: To French
french.prompt: Translate all content to French with formal tone

spanish.title: To Spanish
spanish.prompt: Translate to Spanish (Spain) with friendly tone

improve.title: Improve Existing
improve.prompt: Review and improve existing German translations for naturalness

globalDesign.title: Change Design Theme
globalDesign.description: Update the website's color scheme and design variables for a fresh look without changing structure.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.prompt: Convert to dark theme with dark backgrounds and light text

warmPalette.title: Warm Palette
warmPalette.prompt: Change to warm earth tones (oranges, browns, creams)

corporateBlue.title: Corporate Blue
corporateBlue.prompt: Apply professional blue corporate theme with navy and light blue

restyle.title: Restyle Website
restyle.description: Completely restyle the website's visual appearance including CSS rules, colors, typography, spacing, and effects.

minimalist.title: Minimalist
minimalist.prompt: Restyle with minimalist aesthetic: whitespace, clean typography, subtle shadows

boldColorful.title: Bold & Colorful
boldColorful.prompt: Make bold and vibrant with bright colors, large typography, dynamic elements

glassmorphism.title: Glassmorphism
glassmorphism.prompt: Apply glassmorphism with frosted glass effects, blur backgrounds, gradients

preview.title: Visual Editor
preview.subtitle: Preview and interact with your website in real-time
preview.componentNoVars: This component has no configurable variables
preview.componentEditNotice: This is a component node. Use editComponentToNode to edit component variables.
preview.textOnlyEditNotice: This is a text node. Edit translations using the Translations page.
preview.confirmDeleteNode: Are you sure you want to delete this element?
preview.textKeyEditNotice: Text content is edited through the Translations page. The keys shown above are translation references.
preview.componentNoEditableVars: This component has no editable variables.
preview.styleNotice: Quick CSS tweaks. For complex styling, edit the SCSS file directly.
preview.jsNotice: Manage JavaScript interactions for the selected element.
preview.noInteractions: No interactions yet. Click an element to add one.
preview.selectModeHint: Click any element in the preview to inspect it
preview.dragModeHint: Drag elements to reorder them within their container
preview.textModeHint: Click any text in the preview to edit it inline
preview.styleModeHint: Click an element to edit its style, or use the sections below
preview.jsModeHint: Click an element to manage its JavaScript interactions
preview.selectorsBrowserHint: Search and select CSS selectors to edit their styles
preview.affectedElementsHint: Number of elements affected by this selector
preview.noStylesDefined: No styles defined for this selector
preview.noVariablesAvailable: No CSS variables available. Load the Theme tab first.
preview.varReplacementWarning: You replaced a theme variable with a fixed value. This property will no longer follow theme changes.
preview.noAnimatedSelectors: No selectors with transitions or animations
preview.confirmDeleteKeyframe: Are you sure you want to delete this keyframe?
preview.noDirectTrigger: No direct trigger found - may be unused
preview.keyframeNameHint: Letters, numbers, hyphens. Start with letter.
preview.clickToAddFrame: Click on timeline to add frames
preview.invalidKeyframeName: Invalid keyframe name. Use letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
preview.keyframeExistsConfirm: A keyframe with this name already exists. Do you want to replace it?
preview.atLeastOneFrame: At least one frame with properties is required
preview.frameExists: A frame already exists at this percentage
preview.transformEmpty: No transform functions. Click "Add Function" to start.
preview.transitionDescription: Smoothly animates property changes when triggered (hover, focus, etc.)
preview.transitionHint: Transitions animate property changes between states. Defined on base, applies to all state changes.
preview.animationsIndependent: Animations are independent from transitions. You can use one, both, or neither.
preview.noKeyframesFound: No @keyframes found. Create one in the Animations tab first.
